value.title: Chinese chip maker SMIC’s US$3 billion Shanghai listing is a hedge to reduce company’s reliance on US technology

value.title: Run:AI brings virtualization to GPUs running Kubernetes workloads
value.excerpt: In the early 2000s, VMware introduced the world to virtual servers that allowed IT to make more efficient use of idle server capacity. Today, Run:AI is introducing that same concept to GPUs running containerized machine learning projects on Kubernetes.

images.title: Run:AI brings virtualization to GPUs running Kubernetes workloads

value.title: National Lab Taps AI Machine With Massive Chip to Fight Coronavirus
value.excerpt: Argonne National Laboratory is using the CS-1 computer, from AI chip startup Cerebras Systems, to run learning models aimed at discovering compounds that can be used in existing or new drugs to help create a vaccine or treatments.

images.title: National Lab Taps AI Machine With Massive Chip to Fight Coronavirus

value.title: NVIDIA’s RTX Voice Uses AI And GPUs To Eliminate Noise From Your Video Conferences
value.excerpt: Whether it be someone typing away on a clicky keyboard, or someone’s kids, pets, or television constantly droning on in the background, interfering with the speaker, background noise just plain stinks.

images.title: NVIDIA’s RTX Voice Uses AI And GPUs To Eliminate Noise From Your Video Conferences

value.title: You don't need an GeForce RTX GPU to access RTX Voice, after all
value.excerpt: This app claims to use AI to reduce or outright cancel microphone background noise, and it was only intended to function for RTX card owners. However, as per the usual, the internet has circumvented those limitations. A user over on the Guru3D forums discovered that RTX Voice works "just fine" without a pricey RTX GPU in your system.

images.title: You don't need an GeForce RTX GPU to access RTX Voice, after all
